title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.12 - Wharf demurrage, responsibility for charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.12 - Wharf demurrage, responsibility for charges

State Regulations

Charges for wharf demurrage are assessed against
watercraft, and the operator, owner and general agent as well as the watercraft
shall be liable therefor. All charges are payable in New York funds at the
office of the treasurer of the Port Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1244.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
